name: God Stone
description:
The God is mad... and we need to carve totems to please him! Hurry! Or this will be the end of the world!

----

= How to play =
(2-players is recommended)

  • Carve a totem to match the shape of the god in the picture (i.e. crave out all other blocks that don't match the shape!)
  • Destroy blocks, create & climb ladders, jump jump jump! Do whatever you can to carve the totem as fast as possible!
  • When the time's up and your work is similar enough, the God will like you!
  • But if not, the god will get VERY, VERY MAD!!!
  • Win through 6 different stages, or meet your end!!!

---

= Controls =

Player 1 (Keyboard or Xbox360 Controller)

  • Move [Arrow Keys] or [Controller d-pad] 
  • Dig [Numpad 1] or [Controller X-button]
  • Jump[Numpad 2] or [Controller A-button]
  • Create ladder [Numpad 3] or [Controller B-button]

Player 2 (Keyboard or Xbox360 Controller)

  • Move [W][A][S][D] or [Controller d-pad]
  • Dig [J] or [Controller X-button]
  • Jump [K] or [Controller A-button]
  • Create ladder [L] or [Controller B-button]

---

A game by Jussi, Nat, Min, & Neung
